snippet: The state is ending its relationship with CGI, the company that designed the troubled website used to sign people up for health insurance.
abstract: Vermont announces that it is ending its relationship with CGI, company that designed Vermont Health Connect website; Lawrence Miller, state's chief of health care overhaul, says website is failing many people trying to manage their health insurance via online marketplace.
lead_paragraph: The state is ending its relationship with CGI, the company that designed the troubled website used to sign people up for health insurance.

headline.main: Vermont: State Severs Link to Website Designer
headline.print_headline: Vermont: State Severs Link to Website Designer

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
